entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 1:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: WNW 36 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Amount 4 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
